title: JSON schema for AncientMetagenomeDir ancient host-associated single-genome C14 data
description: The JSON schema for AncientMetagenomeDir ancient host-associated radiocarbon date (C14) information

items.title: The items schema
items.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

project_name.title: AncientMetagenomeDir key of the publication
project_name.description: Format: surnameYYYY (if duplicate key but different publication, add b,c,d etc. as necessary). Must match a AncientMetagenomeDir samples table entry

data_publication_doi.title: Digital Object Identifier (DOI) of the publication.
data_publication_doi.description: A valid DOI code (not as an URL). Must match a AncientMetagenomeDir samples table entry

sample_name.title: Name of the sample
sample_name.description: In most cases this should be the name of the host individual. Must match a AncientMetagenomeDir samples table entry

archive_project.title: Archive project accession platform
archive_project.description: Name of the nucleotide data archiving platform. Must match a AncientMetagenomeDir samples table entry

archive_sample_accession.title: Archive accession number
archive_sample_accession.description: Samples archive accession numbers, multiple records can be separated with commas. No spaces allowed. Must match a AncientMetagenomeDir samples table entry

date_information_present.title: Is Date Information Present?
date_information_present.description: Whether a sample has a specific year-date reported (e.g. 1245, not 15th Century or similar), If false, all other downstream fields should be set to NA

date_is_radiocarbon.title: Is Date Radiocarbon?
date_is_radiocarbon.description: Whether a sample has a specific radiocarbon date reported (e.g. 1245, not 15th Century or similar)

archaeological_historical_date.title: Archaeological or historical date range or singular date
archaeological_historical_date.description: Archaeological or historical date range or singular date. The unit of time is Before Present (before 1950, BP)

multiple_dates.title: Multiple Direct Dates Present?
multiple_dates.description: Whether multiple (direct) dates are present for this sample; if so make multiple rows for the sample with one date per row.

reference_location.title: Location of Reference to Date
reference_location.description: First place where the precise-radiocarbon date was recorded in the primary citation publication (i.e, the publication in ancientMetagenomeDir). main text > supplementary text > supplmentary table.

reference_citation_depth.title: Reference Citation Depth?
reference_citation_depth.description: First place where the precise-radiocarbon date was recorded in the primary citation publication (i.e, the publication in ancientMetagenomeDir). 1 - main text > 2 - supplementary text > 3 - supplementary table.

primary_secondary_reference_citation_doi.title: Digital Object Identifier (DOI) of the publication that the uncalibrated date was originally reported.
primary_secondary_reference_citation_doi.description: DOI of the primary or secondary reference (i.e. the DOI of the publication in which the date was original reported) or permalink

direct_dating.title: Date Directly from Sample?
direct_dating.description: Whether the date of the ancient metagenomic sample was directly from the same skeleton (or similar), or whether inferred from other samples in the same context

radiocarbon_lab_code.title: Radiocarbon Lab Sample ID
radiocarbon_lab_code.description: Lab code of the date, from https://radiocarbon.webhost.uits.arizona.edu/sites/default/files/2025-01/Labs-2025_01_16.pdf NA is no date available, NR is date available but no lab code

radiocarbon_lab_sample_id.title: Radiocarbon Lab Sample ID
radiocarbon_lab_sample_id.description: C14 sample code of the radiocarbon date from the lab

spectrometry_type.title: Delta 13C measurement method.
spectrometry_type.description: Which spectrophotometry method was used to measure the delta carbon-13 value, either with Isotope Ratio Mass Spectrometer (IRMS) or Accelerated Mass Spectrometer (AMS).

pretreatment_type.title: Pretreatment method used for decontamination applied to sample.
pretreatment_type.description: Which spectrophotometry method was used to measure the delta carbon-13 value, either with Isotope Ratio Mass Spectrometer (IRMS) or Accelerated Mass Spectrometer (AMS).
examples: Brown et al. 1988 with Vivaspin® filter cleaning method from Bronk Ramsey et al. (2004)

sample_material.title: Sample Material Used For Dating
sample_material.description: Sample material used for extraction of e.g. collagen for generating the radiocarbon date

uncalibrated_date.title: Uncalibrated Date Year
uncalibrated_date.description: The uncalibrated date in calendar year date Before Present notation

uncalibrated_uncertainty_plus_minus.title: Uncalibrated Date Year Uncertainty
uncalibrated_uncertainty_plus_minus.description: Uncertainty value around uncalibrated date in calendar year date Before Present notation, typically indicated by ±

delta_13c.title: δ13C value
delta_13c.description: The δ13C value of the dating in ppm (‰). Not reported should be represented as -99999.

carbon_perc.title: Carbon percentage
carbon_perc.description: The percentage of carbon in a non-proteinaceous sample used for dating (such as charcoal), expressed as a percentage (%). Used as a quality control measurement. Not reported should be represented as -99999

delta_15n.title: δ15N value
delta_15n.description: The δ15N value of the dating in ppm (‰). Not reported should be represented as -99999

carbon_nitrogen_ratio.title: Carbon nitrogen ratio
carbon_nitrogen_ratio.description: Ratio of amount or concentrations of carbon to nitrogen. Used for quality control value in proteinaceous samples for radiocarbon dating.

calibration_reported.title: Is Calibration Reported?
calibration_reported.description: Whether the date has additionally been calibrated.

calibration_curve.title: Calibration Curve
calibration_curve.description: The tree-ring calibration curve used for calibration.

calibration_software_version.title: Calibration Software
calibration_software_version.description: Which version of the calibration software used, (set NR if not reported)

calibration_software_settings.title: Calibration Software settings
calibration_software_settings.description: Settings used with the calibration software, (set NR if not reported)

calibration_software_citation_doi.title: Digital Object Identifier (DOI) of the radiocarbon calibration software publication.
calibration_software_citation_doi.description: A valid DOI code (not as an URL).

calibrated_range_lower.title: Lower Date of Calibrated Date Range
calibrated_range_lower.description: The lower range of the calibrated date

calibrated_range_upper.title: Upper Date of Calibrated Date Range
calibrated_range_upper.description: The upper range of the calibrated date

calibrated_range_median.title: Median Date of Calibrated Date Range
calibrated_range_median.description: The median date of the calibrated date range

calibrated_range_suffix.title: Suffix of the calibrated date range
calibrated_range_suffix.description: The suffix of the calibrated date range

calibrated_range_sigma.title: Calibrated range sigma
calibrated_range_sigma.description: Confidence level of the reported calibrated age range, typically in 2 (95.4%) or 1 (68.2%) levels of significance (sigma).

reservoir_offset_mentioned.title: Is Reservoir Offset Mentioned?
reservoir_offset_mentioned.description: If radiocarbon C14 reservoir offset mentioned in any form. False here corresponds to not recorded (NR)

reservoir_offset_applied.title: Is Reservoir Offset Applied?
reservoir_offset_applied.description: If an offset correction or recalibration has been reported to have been applied

reservoir_offset_type.title: Is the reported Reservoir Effect of Marine or Freshwater nature?
reservoir_offset_type.description: Specify if the reported reservoir effect is of marine or freshwater origin.

reservoir_offset_reported.title: Reservoir Offset Reported
reservoir_offset_reported.description: If the actual value of the offset has been reported (set NR if applied but actual value of offset not reported)

reservoir_offset_reported_sd.title: Reservoir Offset Reported Standard Deviation
reservoir_offset_reported_sd.description: Standard deviation of the reported reservoir offset. Should be indicated by ±

reservoir_aquatic_carbon_perc.title: Reservoir Offset Aquatic carbon percentage
reservoir_aquatic_carbon_perc.description: Percentage δ13C estimate of fish contribution to reservoir offset value

reservoir_aquatic_carbon_perc_sd.title: Reservoir Offset Reported Standard Deviation
reservoir_aquatic_carbon_perc_sd.description: Standard deviation of % δ13C estimate of fish contribution to reservoir offset value. Should be indicated by ±
